statements: SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS TotalCourses FROM CourseSchedule GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE department='Math';
SELECT course_id, instructor_name, department FROM courses ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_timetables WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT course_id, start_time, end_time, room_number FROM class_timetables WHERE start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, department FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM class_timetables WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science' AND course_name LIKE '%Programming%';

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time, room_number FROM courses INNER JOIN class_timetables ON courses.course_id = class_timetables.course_id WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(timetable_id) AS num_classes FROM class_timetables GROUP BY course_id HAVING COUNT(timetable_id) > 3 ORDER BY num_classes DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM classrooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT course_name, schedule_time FROM courses WHERE schedule_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, room_name, scheduled_date FROM timetable JOIN courses ON timetable.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN classrooms ON timetable.room_id = classrooms.room_id;
SELECT * FROM courses
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM classrooms ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT course_name, room_name, scheduled_date FROM courses INNER JOIN timetable ON courses.course_id = timetable.course_id
SELECT instructor, schedule_time FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%'
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 60;
SELECT course_name, student_name, room_name FROM Courses c JOIN Timetables t ON c.course_id = t.course_id JOIN Students s ON t.student_id = s.student_id JOIN Classrooms r ON t.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT * FROM Timetables WHERE time_slot BETWEEN '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT course_name, student_name, room_name, time_slot FROM Courses c JOIN Timetables t ON c.course_id = t.course_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students s WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Timetables t WHERE t.student_id = s.student_id);
SELECT course_name, room_name, time_slot FROM Courses c JOIN Timetables t ON c.course_id = t.course_id JOIN Classrooms cl ON t.room_id = cl.room_id ORDER BY time_slot DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT * FROM class_timetable WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND room_number = 'A101'
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM class_student
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_timetable WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY class_duration DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, course_name FROM course_schedule JOIN class_instructor ON course_schedule.instructor_name = class_instructor.instructor_name;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM class_student WHERE enrolled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, room_number, day_of_week FROM class_timetable JOIN class_location ON class_timetable.room_number = class_location.room_number;
